mapper.select: select * from mb_event_class where EVENT_CLASS = #{eventClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COLUMN_STATUS !='W'
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_event_class
EVENT_CLASS,
EVENT_CLASS_DESC,
EVENT_CLASS_LEVEL,
PARENT_EVENT_CLASS,
COMPANY,

mapper.select:
select
EVENT_CLASS pk_value, EVENT_CLASS || ' ' || EVENT_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
EVENT_CLASS pk_value,concat(EVENT_CLASS,' ',EVENT_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_event_class

select
EVENT_CLASS pk_value, EVENT_CLASS || ' ' || EVENT_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
EVENT_CLASS pk_value,concat(EVENT_CLASS,' ',EVENT_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_event_class where EVENT_CLASS_LEVEL = '1'

select
EVENT_CLASS pk_value, EVENT_CLASS || ' ' || EVENT_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
EVENT_CLASS pk_value,concat(EVENT_CLASS,' ',EVENT_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_event_class where EVENT_CLASS_LEVEL = #{eventClassLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
EVENT_CLASS pk_value, EVENT_CLASS || ' ' || EVENT_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
EVENT_CLASS pk_value,concat(EVENT_CLASS,' ',EVENT_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_event_class
where PARENT_EVENT_CLASS LIKE #{parentEventClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from mb_event_class where PARENT_EVENT_CLASS LIKE #{parentEventClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
